snippet: The company’s earnings were the result of winning more long-term deals to provide business services to companies, affirming a strategic shift.
lead_paragraph: The company’s earnings were the result of winning more long-term deals to provide business services to companies, affirming a strategic shift.

headline.main: Profit Jumps 28% at Xerox, Helped by Its Business Services
headline.print_headline: Profit Jumps 28% at Xerox, Helped by Its Business Services
